sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE160404 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_SEIL_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN , PRCSP_FMNM_NM , PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT , PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_REDU_END_DT , PRCSP_PAY_SUM , PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM , PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM , PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM , PRCSP_AGGR_SUM , FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM , REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_NNKS_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_PRCS_YN , PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN , PRCSP_YETA_C165 , PRCSP_YETA_C166 , PRCSP_YETA_C167 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# , ( SELECT NVL( MAX(PRCSP_SEIL_NUM)+1 ,1 ) FROM YE160404 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM = #whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# ) , ( SELECT RESN_REGN_NUM FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# ) , #prcspTxpyrAsocYn# , #prcspFmnmNm# , #prcspBusoprRgstnum# , #prcspDutyBgnnDt# , #prcspDutyEndDt# , #prcspReduBgnnDt# , #prcspReduEndDt# , #prcspPaySum# , #prcspAllwBnusSum# , #prcspRcgtnBnusSum# , #prcspStckEvntPrftSum# , #prcspEmpStkscWdrwSum# , #prcspEcteRsgtnExceSum# , #prcspAggrSum# , #freeDtyAggrSum# , #reduIncmAggrSum# , #prcspIncmTxSum# , #prcspRgonIncmTxSum# , #prcspNnksSum# , #prcspHlthPrmmSum# , #prcspLgtmRcptnSum# , #prcspHlthLgcptnAggr# , #prcspHlthPrmmDducSum# , #prcspEmymtPrmmSum# , #prcspEmytPrmmDducSum# , #prcspPrcsYn# , #prcspWhdgReipSumtYn# , #prcspYetaC165# , #prcspYetaC166# , #prcspYetaC167# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE160404 SET PRCSP_PAY_SUM =#prcspPaySum# , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM =#prcspIncmTxSum# , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM =#prcspRgonIncmTxSum# , ISMT =#ismt# , REVN_DT =TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR =#revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

UPDATE YE160404 SET PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN =#prcspTxpyrAsocYn# , PRCSP_FMNM_NM =#prcspFmnmNm# , PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT =#prcspDutyBgnnDt# , PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT =#prcspDutyEndDt# , PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT =#prcspReduBgnnDt# , PRCSP_REDU_END_DT =#prcspReduEndDt# , PRCSP_PAY_SUM =#prcspPaySum# , PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM =#prcspAllwBnusSum# , PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM =#prcspRcgtnBnusSum# , PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM =#prcspStckEvntPrftSum# , PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM =#prcspEmpStkscWdrwSum# , PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM =#prcspEcteRsgtnExceSum# , PRCSP_AGGR_SUM =#prcspAggrSum# , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM =#prcspIncmTxSum# , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM =#prcspRgonIncmTxSum# , PRCSP_NNKS_SUM =#prcspNnksSum# , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM =#prcspHlthPrmmSum# , PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM =#prcspLgtmRcptnSum# , PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR =#prcspHlthLgcptnAggr# , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM =#prcspHlthPrmmDducSum# , PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM =#prcspEmymtPrmmSum# , PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM =#prcspEmytPrmmDducSum# , PRCSP_PRCS_YN =#prcspPrcsYn# , PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN =#prcspWhdgReipSumtYn# , FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM =#freeDtyAggrSum# , REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM =#reduIncmAggrSum# , PRCSP_YETA_C165 =#prcspYetaC165# , PRCSP_YETA_C166 =#prcspYetaC166# , PRCSP_YETA_C167 =#prcspYetaC167# , ISMT =#ismt# , REVN_DT =TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR =#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#prcspBusoprRgstnum# AND PRCSP_SEIL_NUM=#prcspSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE160404 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# AND PRCSP_SEIL_NUM=#prcspSeilNum#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.YRTX_BLGG_YR , A.CLUT_SEPT_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(A.DPOB_CD, A.CLUT_SEPT_CD) AS CLUT_SEPT_NM , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , A.PRCSP_SEIL_NUM , A.RESN_REGN_NUM , A.PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN , A.PRCSP_FMNM_NM , A.PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , A.PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT , A.PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT , A.PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT , A.PRCSP_REDU_END_DT , A.PRCSP_PAY_SUM , A.PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM , A.PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM , A.PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM , A.PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM , A.PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM , A.PRCSP_AGGR_SUM , A.FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM , A.REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM , A.PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM , A.PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , A.PRCSP_NNKS_SUM , A.PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM , A.PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM , A.PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR , A.PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , A.PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM , A.PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , A.PRCSP_PRCS_YN , A.PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR , A.PRCSP_YETA_C165 , A.PRCSP_YETA_C166 , A.PRCSP_YETA_C167 , B.NAT_PENN_PRMM_SUM , B.NAT_PENN_ARA_PRMM_SUM , B.NAT_PENN_DDUC_SUM , B.PUOFER_ANTY , B.PUOFER_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , B.MLTYM_ANTY , B.MLTYM_ANTY_DDUC_SUM , B.PRTAFIR_SCHL_FALYMM_ANTY , B.PRTAFIR_SCHL_DDUC_SUM , B.SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_ANTY , B.SPILDTN_PSTOFIC_DDUC_SUM , C.HAN_NM AS FNM
FROM YE160404 A, YE160406 B, PSNL0100 C WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.YRTX_BLGG_YR = B.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND A.CLUT_SEPT_CD = B.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM = B.WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM
AND A.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = C.SYSTEMKEY
AND A.DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND A.YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND A.CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND A.SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey#
ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD , A.YRTX_BLGG_YR , A.CLUT_SEPT_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , A.PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE160404 A, YE160406 B, PSNL0100 C WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.YRTX_BLGG_YR = B.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND A.CLUT_SEPT_CD = B.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM = B.WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM
AND A.DPOB_CD = C.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = C.SYSTEMKEY
AND A.DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND A.YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND A.CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND A.SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE160404 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_SEIL_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN , PRCSP_FMNM_NM , PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT , PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_REDU_END_DT , PRCSP_PAY_SUM , PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM , PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM , PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM , PRCSP_AGGR_SUM , FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM , REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_NNKS_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR , PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_PRCS_YN , PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# , #prcspSeilNum# , #resnRegnNum# , #prcspTxpyrAsocYn# , #prcspFmnmNm# , #prcspBusoprRgstnum# , #prcspDutyBgnnDt# , #prcspDutyEndDt# , #prcspReduBgnnDt# , #prcspReduEndDt# , #prcspPaySum# , #prcspAllwBnusSum# , #prcspRcgtnBnusSum# , #prcspStckEvntPrftSum# , #prcspEmpStkscWdrwSum# , #prcspEcteRsgtnExceSum# , #prcspAggrSum# , #freeDtyAggrSum# , #reduIncmAggrSum# , #prcspIncmTxSum# , #prcspRgonIncmTxSum# , #prcspNnksSum# , #prcspHlthPrmmSum# , #prcspLgtmRcptnSum# , #prcspHlthPrmmDducSum# , #prcspHlthLgcptnAggr# , #prcspEmymtPrmmSum# , #prcspEmytPrmmDducSum# , #prcspPrcsYn# , #prcspWhdgReipSumtYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE160404 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum# , PRCSP_SEIL_NUM=#prcspSeilNum# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN=#prcspTxpyrAsocYn# , PRCSP_FMNM_NM=#prcspFmnmNm# , PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#prcspBusoprRgstnum# , PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT=#prcspDutyBgnnDt# , PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT=#prcspDutyEndDt# , PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT=#prcspReduBgnnDt# , PRCSP_REDU_END_DT=#prcspReduEndDt# , PRCSP_PAY_SUM=#prcspPaySum# , PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM=#prcspAllwBnusSum# , PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM=#prcspRcgtnBnusSum# , PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM=#prcspStckEvntPrftSum# , PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM=#prcspEmpStkscWdrwSum# , PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM=#prcspEcteRsgtnExceSum# , PRCSP_AGGR_SUM=#prcspAggrSum# , FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM=#freeDtyAggrSum# , REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM=#reduIncmAggrSum# , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM=#prcspIncmTxSum# , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM=#prcspRgonIncmTxSum# , PRCSP_NNKS_SUM=#prcspNnksSum# , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM=#prcspHlthPrmmSum# , PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM=#prcspLgtmRcptnSum# , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM=#prcspHlthPrmmDducSum# , PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR=#prcspHlthLgcptnAggr# , PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM=#prcspEmymtPrmmSum# , PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM=#prcspEmytPrmmDducSum# , PRCSP_PRCS_YN=#prcspPrcsYn# , PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN=#prcspWhdgReipSumtYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE160404 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum#
DELETE FROM YE160404 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_SEIL_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN , PRCSP_FMNM_NM , PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT , PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_REDU_END_DT , PRCSP_PAY_SUM , PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM , PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM , PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM , PRCSP_AGGR_SUM , FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM , REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_NNKS_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR , PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_PRCS_YN , PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160404 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM=#whdgDebrBusoprRgstnum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_SEIL_NUM , RESN_REGN_NUM , PRCSP_TXPYR_ASOC_YN , PRCSP_FMNM_NM , PRCSP_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , PRCSP_DUTY_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_DUTY_END_DT , PRCSP_REDU_BGNN_DT , PRCSP_REDU_END_DT , PRCSP_PAY_SUM , PRCSP_ALLW_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_RCGTN_BNUS_SUM , PRCSP_STCK_EVNT_PRFT_SUM , PRCSP_EMP_STKSC_WDRW_SUM , PRCSP_ECTE_RSGTN_EXCE_SUM , PRCSP_AGGR_SUM , FREE_DTY_AGGR_SUM , REDU_INCM_AGGR_SUM , PRCSP_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_RGON_INCM_TX_SUM , PRCSP_NNKS_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_LGTM_RCPTN_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_HLTH_LGCPTN_AGGR , PRCSP_EMYMT_PRMM_SUM , PRCSP_EMYT_PRMM_DDUC_SUM , PRCSP_PRCS_YN , PRCSP_WHDG_REIP_SUMT_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160404 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE160404 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT DISTINCT RESID FROM (SELECT RESID FROM PDF_C101Y UNION ALL
SELECT RESID FROM PDF_A102Y UNION ALL SELECT INSU1_RESID FROM PDF_A102Y UNION ALL SELECT INSU2_RESID_1 FROM PDF_A102Y UNION ALL SELECT INSU2_RESID_2 FROM PDF_A102Y UNION ALL SELECT INSU2_RESID_3 FROM PDF_A102Y UNION ALL
SELECT RESID FROM PDF_C101Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_C202Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_C301Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_C401Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_D101Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_E102Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_F102Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_G106Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_G206Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_G306Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_J101Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_J203Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_J301Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_J401Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_K101Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_L102Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_N101Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_O101Y UNION ALL SELECT RESID FROM PDF_P102Y UNION ALL SELECT FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AS RESID FROM YE167520 UNION ALL SELECT RESNO_ENC_CNTN AS RESID FROM YE164010 )
